name: Nathan Speedshot Plus Handheld Pack
description: Keep your hydration and nutrition handy on your run with this flask plus adjustable strap that lets you relax your grip while on the move. The expandable pocket carries a few gels plus essentials like keys and and your cards, perfect for short to medium distances.355ml Ergo Flask has a TPE grip and a valved cap that provides quick blasts of fluid.Adjustable hand strap.Expandable zippered pocket.
